content: Sync LDAP data is a way to synchronize data changes between your portal and the LDAP server. Enable the ‘Auto Sync’ option and set a time period to automatically update the information.

comment.text: Sync LDAP data is used to synchronize changes between your portal and an LDAP server. This feature can be enabled to automatically update information at a set interval. It appears in the PortalSettings page under the "Auto Sync" option.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a hyphen in 'Automaattinen synkronointi' when it should likely be a space. While hyphenation exists in Finnish, in this context a space would be more natural and readable.

The translation uses single quotes for 'Auto Sync'. Japanese typically uses double quotes (”” or 『』) for English terms or a katakana representation. While single quotes aren't inherently wrong, double quotes are more common.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider changing 'Auto Sync' to ”自動同期” or ”オート同期”.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Sync LDAP data' is translated as 'ການເຊື່ອມໂອ້ຂໍ້ມູນ LDAP'. While technically correct, a more natural translation might be 'ການເຊື່ອມໂອ້ຂໍ້ມູນຈາກ LDAP' or 'ການເຊື່ອມໂອ້ຂໍ້ມູນເຂົ້າ LDAP'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການເຊື່ອມໂອ້ຂໍ້ມູນຈາກ LDAP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: 'ດຶງຕົວເລືອກ ‘Auto Sync’ ມາໃຊ້' is a somewhat awkward translation of 'Enable the ‘Auto Sync’ option'. It literally means 'pull the 'Auto Sync' option to use'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເປີດໃຊ້ຕົວເລືອກ ‘Auto Sync’

ai_spell_check_issues.description: 'ປັບປ່ຽນຂໍ້ມູນ' is a broad term and might not convey the intended meaning of 'update the information'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ອັບເດດຂໍ້ມູນ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Opcja Synchronizuj dane LDAP' is awkward and doesn't directly translate 'Sync LDAP data'. It translates more literally to 'Option: Synchronize LDAP data'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Synchronizacja danych LDAP is a more natural translation for 'Sync LDAP data'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'wybierz czas' is a literal translation of 'set a time period.' A more natural Polish phrasing would be to indicate a scheduling aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ustaw harmonogram aktualizacji or Ustaw częstotliwość aktualizacji

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'transferul de date' (data transfer) is not the best translation for 'data changes'. It implies a one-way movement of data rather than a synchronization.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sincronizarea modificărilor de date (Synchronization of data changes)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “se vor efectua actualizări” sounds awkward. A more natural phrasing would convey a scheduled or automated process.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: pentru a actualiza automat informațiile (to automatically update the information)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation uses parentheses for 'Auto Sync' which might not be the standard way to represent English terms in Sinhala. Consider using quotes or italicization instead.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using quotes (”Auto Sync” ) or italicization ( *Auto Sync* ) instead of parentheses.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation includes quotation marks around 'Automatická synchronizácia'. While technically correct, in a technical documentation context, it's more common to omit them or use different formatting (e.g., bolding).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the quotation marks or format the term differently (e.g., *Automatická synchronizácia*).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Омогуц́ите' has an incorrect character. It should be 'Омогућите'.
The word 'Omogućite' is misspelled. It should be 'Omogućite'.

The phrase 'LDAP verilerini senkronize etmek' (Synchronizing LDAP data) is a bit awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'LDAP verilerinin senkronizasyonu' or 'LDAP verilerini senkronize etme işlemi'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: LDAP verilerinin senkronizasyonu, portalınız ile LDAP sunucusu arasındaki veri değişikliklerini senkronize etmenin bir yoludur.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'bir yoludur' (is a way) feels a little stiff. It's not necessarily wrong, but a more natural phrasing could improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: LDAP verilerini senkronize etmek, portalınız ile LDAP sunucusu arasındaki veri değişikliklerini senkronize etme işlemidir.
